line.text: So oft have I invoked thee for my muse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And found such fair assistance in my verse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As every alien pen hath got my use
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And under thee their poesy disperse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thine eyes that taught the dumb on high to sing
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And heavy ignorance aloft to fly
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Have added feathers to the learned wing
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And given grace a double majesty
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Yet be most proud of that which I compile
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whose influence is thine and born of thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In others works thou dost but mend the style
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And arts with thy sweet graces graced be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But thou art all my art and dost advance
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As high as learning my rude ignorance
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
